channel.title: A little help
channel.description:
Does any1 have a command for 317 for this
i want it so if u have 999m u can do ::buyticket and have 1 ticket which u can do ::sellticket to get ur 999m bk
so u cud have like 2147m then do ::buyticket then earn 2000m again then ::Buyticket etc
i've looked around but nothing answear's my question
thank's if you help me :)
i'm using 317 edgevilliage pking source
btw. any1 have the commands for resetting?
like reset def atk,str, etc
thank's alot i#m looking everywere but nothing answear's my questions

i dont need a home command wtf

item.title: A little help
item.dc:creator: @Kwia Kwia
item.description:
@Kwia wrote:

hmm… So You Dont Have " } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“home”)) {
if (teleblock == true) {
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”); // made by NAME HERE
} else {
teleportToX = (TELE COORD HERE);
teleportToY = (TELE COORD HERE);
sendMessage(“You teleport to Home.”);
} "

item.title: A little help
item.dc:creator: @Kwia Kwia
item.description:
@Kwia wrote:

Uhm… I Think I Know How Your Stating That Question…

But If Your Like Wondering How To Edit The Command?..

All You Do Is Go Into The File “Client.JAVA”

Search “Resetdef” “Resetstr” “Resetatk”

And Then You Can Edit The Commands.

Read full topic

ifcommandstartswith.(resetdef) etc…

and thank’s i’ll try the ticket

item.title: A little help
item.dc:creator: @Kwia Kwia
item.description:
@Kwia wrote:

Not Quite Sure About Your First Question… But I Can Help You With The Command For Reseting Your Stats, That Is If Its Added In Your Client.java File…

The Commands For Reseting Stats:

::resetatk
::resetstr
::resetdef

And Rixxx… You Also Forgot… Would If They Want To Sell The Ticket Back?..

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“buyticket”)) { if (playerHasItem(995, 2147000000) { // do stuff here }}

vvvvv I’m Not Quite Sure Thats Right…
“if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“sellticket”)) { if (playerHasItem(TICKET ID, 1) { // do stuff here }}”

Read full topic

item.title: A little help

item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("buyticket")) { if (playerHasItem(995, 2147000000) { // do stuff here } }
